zh: 我简直不敢相信自己的眼睛。

en: I saw it with my own eyes.
zh: 我亲眼所见。

en: I felt that my honor was at stake.
zh: 我感到我的荣誉受到了威胁。

en: I found my name written on the blackboard.
zh: 我发现我的名字写在黑板上。

en: I was surprised to hear my name called.
zh: 听到有人叫我的名字，我很惊讶。

en: I could hear my name called.
zh: 我能听到有人叫我的名字。

en: I quoted some famous phrases in my book.
zh: 我在我的书中引用了一些名言。

en: I don't care what people think about the way I dress.
zh: 我不在乎别人怎么看我的穿着。

en: I've spent the entire morning cleaning my room.
zh: 我整个上午都在打扫我的房间。

en: I will sweep out my room.
zh: 我要打扫我的房间。
